entry.title: Final Preparations
entry.summary:
The past few weeks have been more of the same. Last minute preparations are being made and plans put in place. I feel like a lot of my checklist has been marked off and just as many things have been added back on.

Apply for passport

Apply for PCT permits

"Finalize" schedule and resupply points

Finalize gear and clothing

Purchase bear canister for Sierras

Training hikes

Pack and ship bounce box

Pack and ship first resupply box

Pack and store all of my non-PCT possessions

Figure out car insurance and storage

Change cell phone plan to something that works on trail

One last training hike in Big Sur

Finish my taxes!

Check in with friends and family before I leave

My friend Matt (who is hiking the trail with me) and I went on a three night trip at the beginning of the week and were able to put our rain gear to the test. I'll be writing up a post about that in the next few days. For now, I'm just trying to tick some of those boxes.

We leave for San Diego in one week and hit the trail soon after.
